# Reference Tables

| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Aries** | Mars | Sun (19°) | Sun / Jupiter | Venus | Saturn |
| **Taurus** | Venus | Moon (3°) | Venus / Moon | Mars | N/A |
| **Gemini** | Mercury | N/A | Saturn / Mercury | Jupiter | N/A |
| **Cancer** | Moon | Jupiter (15°) | Venus / Mars | Saturn | Mars |
| **Leo** | Sun | N/A | Sun / Jupiter | Saturn | N/A |
| **Virgo** | Mercury | Mercury (15°) | Venus / Moon | Jupiter | Venus |
| **Libra** | Venus | Saturn (21°) | Saturn / Mercury | Mars | Sun |
| **Scorpio** | Mars | N/A | Venus / Mars | Venus | Moon |
| **Sagittarius** | Jupiter | N/A | Sun / Jupiter | Mercury | N/A |
| **Capricorn** | Saturn | Mars (28°) | Venus / Moon | Moon | Jupiter |
| **Aquarius** | Saturn | N/A | Saturn / Mercury | Sun | N/A |
| **Pisces** | Jupiter | Venus (27°) | Venus / Mars | Mercury | Mercury |

> *Note: Triplicity rulers listed follow the Dorothean system.*

## The Chaldean Order (Planetary Spheres)

1.  **Saturn** (Slowest / Outermost)
2.  **Jupiter**
3.  **Mars**
4.  **Sun**
5.  **Venus**
6.  **Mercury**
7.  **Moon** (Fastest / Sublunar)
